page.title: 14Village Hall Wimbish
page.content: This was built in 1930 and has since been greatly enlarged and modernised largely through money raised by the villagers.It is the centre of the social life of the village. It provides room for the Pre-school childrens play group,the Good Companions Club(for people over 50 years of age). It is used for meetings of the Fete Committee ( which has helped to raise thousands of pounds for the Hall ),the Parish Council and other village clubs and associations. It is in constant demand for Wedding receptions,Dances and Parties.Every Wednesday night it is used for Bingo. The Hall is held by three trustees on behalf of the village.Financially it is self supporting.
